text: Steven Charles Watkins Jr. (born September 18, 1976) is an American veteran, politician and businessman. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Kansas' . He is a Republican. In July 2020, Watkins was charged with voter fraud by Shawnee County District Attorney.Kansas congressman faces felony charges related to 2019 local election, CNN, Paul LeBlanc,, July 14, 2020. Retrieved July 15, 2020. In August 2020, he lost his re-election primary campaign to Kansas State Treasurer Jake LaTurner. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Steve Watkins official U.S. House website *Steve Watkins for Congress |- Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Kansas Republicans
title: Steve Watkins
